infos.value: I'm sorry, Brother. I got a bit carried away...
So this is how «Nitor» tastes its first defeat... Losing is a cruel thing.
My apologies for the delay, Adelard.
I would go ahead and take back that part about our first defeat, Brother.
Oh, what's this now? King Robb of Hourne, in the flesh?
Killing him would have us set for life, aye!
So «Solidus» and «Nitor» are both out here in the lineup, are they?
Hmph. You believe yourself a match for our armies?
There is a reason why «Solidus» is so named.
Go ahead, strike at them with all your might.
